title: Pedro Albizu Campos Denounces U.S. in San Juan
summary: On this day, Albizu Campos gave a speech in San Juan condemning U.S. control over Puerto Rico and calling for complete independence.
quote: The United States is a monster, and it knows it.

title: UN Discusses Puerto Rico's Colonial Status
summary: On this day, the United Nations took up discussion of Puerto Rico’s right to self-determination, sparking debate over U.S. colonial influence.
quote: Colonialism is incompatible with the principles of the United Nations.
